title: A Trip to a Prehistoric Cave
subtle: Informational Narrative (fiction), 1,441 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 850L
description: Emmanuel and Victor never expected to find such archeological wonders in France. Come with them as they discover Font de Gaume, a cave with Paleolithic paintings, and Prehisto Parc, filled with life-sized scenes of these ancient peoples. The boys and their parents experience firsthand what life was like for early humans, and you will, too!
highFrequencyWords: archaeologists, engraved, enhance, Homo sapiens, illuminate, larvae, lured, outcroppings, Paleolithic, polychromatic, stalactites, stalagmites
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Compound Predicates                : Identify compound predicates in sentences
awareness: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order to the third letter
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
